title: Riot seems to be working on Lissandra changes

embed.description: Learn how to play Agony's Embrace. Evelynn Reveal http://na.leagueoflegends.com/us/featured/champion-reveal-evelynn Evelynn Champion Tease https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ku08ef-_D0 Evelynn Social Tease https://www.instagram.com/p/BZSjfnzHfdb/

body:
I may be crazy but at 3:27  Lissandra´s Q range is way bigger and It also looks like they changed her Auto Attack animation and effects

It could be that they further working on the Lissandra mini rework that was on the PBE with the new passive awhile ago that never made it to the live servers

Who knows I could be completely wrong

EDIT: I was completely wrong. gotta go to bed

replies.body:
Hate to say it but that is just a max range Q

They're fun to pull off :)
Yah pretty sure this just happened to be a long range one. Sorry to spoil the conspiracy and excitement but we don't have any increased Q range changes in for her in any of her tests I've seen.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2TeRTRbU,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2017-10-10T01:58:54.260+0000)
>
> Yah pretty sure this just happened to be a long range one. Sorry to spoil the conspiracy and excitement but we don't have any increased Q range changes in for her in any of her tests I've seen.

yeah better let her trash tier for another season boyz

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2TeRTRbU,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2017-10-10T01:58:54.260+0000)
>
> Yah pretty sure this just happened to be a long range one. Sorry to spoil the conspiracy and excitement but we don't have any increased Q range changes in for her in any of her tests I've seen.

So there are at least tests for her? That's something I guess. Hope you guys will make her great again in the next season.
Don't make us Lissandra mains wait too long :( Please!! :P

Is the range that long though? It’s maybe I haven’t seen a Liss in long time

I should go to bed

It's best shown in her Blade Queen skin.

Lissandra mains are still waiting in the shadows for any impending buffs
Yeah... it is. The Liss simply clipped the Lux with the tip of her Q.

Lissandra's Q spike spreads when it hits someone, the length and width of the hitbox gets bigger thanks to that. her Q range is ok, it's just that the indicator is even more misleading than ahri's Q and gragas E

~~ They had to put something interesting in the replay to cover up how gutted her ultimate must be from the pbe to not kill a 310 hp darius with empowered ultimate, on the pbe an empowered ult lvl 1 is 300 ap  dmg +150% ap and even with components that should have been a kill or at the very least dropped him within 50 hp range. ~~
Breaking it down the empowered ultimate seems to only have done 200 damage empowered lvl 1.

Also the lissandra changes look cool, looks like it bounced off a minion.

edit: ok so apparently they used really old footage from when eves R only did 100 damage empowered for some dumb reason.
Nice eyes friend, she does seem a bit different.
Inb4 Evelynn getting killed by 3 crits by any ADC.
So disappointed there is nothing planned for her. She NEEDS to be changed it many ways. I don't know why Riot ignores that?
Not really many ways. Mostly her passive and her Q, especially the unnatural amount of mana it costs
I bet an amumu rework is coming too with  how champs have recently been reacting to him.
theres a meme somewhere in here that ive miss entirely
I saw that and I was like woah. That seemed really long.
yea i was on the pbe the other day and does not seem so, could be a glitch or it just looks like it is bigger
